dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.eventing

Class WidgetSelectionEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.eventing.WidgetSelectionEvent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ButtonSelectionEvent, ComboboxSelectionEvent, TableDeselectionEvent, TableSelectionEvent, TreeTableSelectionEvent

    public class WidgetSelectionEvent
extends java.lang.Object
    This event is fired by widget of the guided configuration when a selection is done (e.g. cells are selected in a table, a button is pressed).

    Events are fired to ISelectionEventListener.selectionChanged(WidgetSelectionEvent).

    This class is sub-classed by events fired by the actual widget.

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    2009.a
    See Also:
    AbstractBackend
